changes.change: Add arm64e compatibility for new 5S model
Fix Notification Center action crashing on iOS 13.4+
Fix action disabling in applications for iOS 13+ (still broken on lockscreen).
Fix crash when invoking Notification Center action on lockscreen
Fix taps being broken due to physical button changes from previous version
Improve physical button press handling after a long hold
Make taps not ignore physical button presses
Fix LastApp action reopening app that was already closed, it'll do nothing now
Fix disable actions not working for iOS 10 - 10.1
Add iOS 13 compatibility (missing disable while authentication)
Change how vibration is handled (should still function the same)
Force enable reachability for iPads so other tweaks are not required anymore
Fix actions being performed during Touch ID Authentication
Added option to waste battery (wake up device using tap)
Added option to open last app as one of the actions
Added option to lock rotations
Added option to rotate to portrait orientation and lock
Fix long hold being invoked after tap and hold fails, so long hold should be faster now
Fix memory leak
Slightly improve performance by removing uncessary instructions
Fix crashes on iOS 11
Fix taking screenshot on iOS 11
Slight optomizations to gesture creation
Fix activating switcher on iOS 10.3.3+
Made Notification Center as a action not crash on iOS 11 (don't use NC as a Action, it does nothing)
Added Screenshot, Control Center and Notification Center as actions
Fixed Siri not being dismissed when performing same action again
Changed donate link to paypal.me link
Added preferences
Initial Release
